actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs

official_title: To amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to allow the importation of polar bear trophies taken in sport hunts in Canada.
short_title: Restoration of the U.S.-Russia Polar Bear Conservation Fund Act of 2013

summary.text: Restoration of the U.S.-Russia Polar Bear Conservation Fund Act of 2013 - Amends the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to allow the importation of polar bear parts taken legally in sport hunts in Canada.

titles.title: Restoration of the U.S.-Russia Polar Bear Conservation Fund Act of 2013
To amend the Marine Mammal Protection Act of 1972 to allow the importation of polar bear trophies taken in sport hunts in Canada.
